message:
Title: Pathways of Purpose

Thought leads me to the light,
Excitement beguiled by insight.
Laughing at life's grand plight,
Endlessly chasing what feels right.
Oh, am I the kite or flight?
Lazy theories tucked in night,
Onions carrying wisdom's might:
Grins at the Unspeakable, dancing in daylight.
Yearns for infinity, in a humorous fight.
